column1: Uchi////The best part about Uchi was the service AND DON'T LET ANYONE TELL YOU DIFFERENT. I don't know what the heck people are talking about with the overbearing service?? What? You don't like your food brought promptly to your table by the next available server? Gee
column2: so sorry. Every server knew exactly what they were serving and could answer any question you had (and believe me
column4: nor wine glass were ever empty and I was very impressed with their laid back approach to ordering. Order as you go
column5: order it all at the beginning
column7: order next Tuesday.... it didn't matter. Whenever you're ready our waiter would say. And as it should be.
